pages.text: In order to leave the planet, you need to use your Advanced Comptuer to jump your spaceship directly upwards. After a time, you and your ship will be teleported to space! To re-enter a planet, you simply jump down while you are over the planet.$(br2)Make sure you have gathered plenty of resources before leaving!

Asteroids contain many ores, but things such as Wood are hard to come by in the vacuum of space.$(br2)After you have reached space, you can look around and see each of the planets around. They are larger and more noticeable than the stars. Reference the map on our $(l:https://github.com/zediious/galacticdrive/wiki/The-Solar-System)(WIKI)$(/l) to determine your next steps!$(br2)Never forget how useful JEI is. Never!
